China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 15 日星期五 11:10:40 下午120
TikTok urges US users to call senators to vote no on TikTok banTikTok displayed a notification to some U.S. users on Friday, urging them to call their senators and ask them to vote no to a bill that would ban the popular short-form video app if it is not divested from Chinese tech company ByteDance. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 18:39:57 GMT F52TATRICRNWLCCL45UC6Q3H5A https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktok-urged-us-users-call-senators-vote-no-tiktok-ban-2024-03-15/Sheila Dang, Nazli Togrul技术
China's JD.com walks away from offer for Britain's CurrysChina-based online retailer JD.com said on Friday it would not make an offer for British electricals group Currys , days after U.S. investor Elliott Advisors walked away. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 14:11:32 GMT MT7YTBILMBPKZBVAEH6TEOFALE https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/china-jdcom-walks-away-bidding-curries-2024-03-15/Reuters市场交易
BMW apologizes after criticism from annual Chinese consumer showGerman carmaker BMW apologized to Chinese drivers on Friday after its BMW 530Li model's transmission shaft was singled out on the country's annual consumer day gala television show for producing "disturbing" noises. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 13:56:22 GMT NUHP76WTEFNXVE77FMS4ZQ64VM https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/bmw-spotlight-chinas-annual-consumer-rights-day-2024-03-15/Sophie Yu, Casey Hall商业汽车与交通
China's CATL posts first quarterly profit fall since 2022, regains market shareChinese electric vehicle battery maker CATL posted its first drop in quarterly net profit since the second quarter of 2022 on Friday as it wrestled with smaller competitors amid slowing demand in the world's largest auto market. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:40:37 GMT YXTHXKYX4FKV3HCEFZ3D36BQZU https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/chinas-catl-posts-first-profit-fall-since-q2-2022-2024-03-15/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Apple reaches $490 million settlement over CEO Cook's China sales commentsApple agreed to pay $490 million to settle a class-action lawsuit that alleged Chief Executive Tim Cook defrauded shareholders by concealing falling demand for iPhones in China. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:27:12 GMT 6AW33JRTSFM6FJKJOVKTPAM https://www.reuters.com/legal/apple-reaches-490-million-settlement-with-shareholders-over-china-sales-comments-2024-03-15/Jonathan Stempel可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
TikTok's US revenue hits $16 bln as Washington threatens ban, FT reportsChina's ByteDance-owned TikTok posted revenue of about $16 billion last year in the United States, where the viral video app that has hooked Gen Z users is at the risk of being banned, the Financial Times reported on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:17:24 GMT 6HAMGTBIEZJQ5EAW3LXHG22EYY https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktoks-us-revenue-hits-16-bln-washington-threatens-ban-ft-reports-2024-03-15/Reuters技术
China's Xi willing to work with Angola as it moves on from oilChinese President Xi Jinping said he would support Chinese firms that invest in Angola's agriculture and manufacturing sectors, state media reported on Friday, as the African oil producing nation seeks help in diversifying its economy. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:17:17 GMT WMDJ3GPRERMGJJIWMPHW5GHY4Q https://www.reuters.com/world/chinas-xi-willing-work-with-angola-moves-oil-2024-03-15/Joe Cash世界
TikTok ban bill: What we know about Tiktok's Chinese ownerThe U.S. House of Representatives overwhelmingly passed a bill this week that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the U.S. assets of the short video app, or face a ban, in the greatest threat to the app since the Trump administration. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:38:35 GMT 47ALPVYTWVPRJD475AZYLHUSE https://www.reuters.com/technology/what-do-we-know-about-tiktoks-chinese-owner-bytedance-2024-03-15/Josh Ye技术
TikTok advertisers will look to rivals if US Senate moves ahead on banAdvertisers who turn to TikTok to market to young consumers are preparing contingency plans with social media rivals in the event the short-form video app is sold or banned in the U.S., but they are waiting for signs of Senate action before shifting marketing budgets. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:02:56 GMT IGB32UZTURMCXCRNVE6IAZPJHY https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktok-advertisers-will-look-rivals-if-us-senate-moves-ahead-ban-2024-03-15/Sheila Dang技术
China's 'quant' funds conform as regulators crack down after crashChina's computer-driven "quant" hedge funds are beefing up risk management and retooling their portfolios to conform to the state's definitions of fair play, as regulators clamp down on the $260 billion sector to revive retail investor confidence. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 04:54:09 GMT A4COOZXDRJIMHMPUZMHIVX45GE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-quant-funds-conform-regulators-crack-down-after-crash-2024-03-15/Samuel Shen, Summer Zhen可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Nissan considering partnership with Honda on EVs - sourcesNissan Motor is considering seeking a business partnership with Honda Motor on key components for electric vehicles to cut production costs, three people familiar with the matter at Nissan said. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 04:00:12 GMT GCEVIB4XJVLLNGLYJRNKEQZVXY https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/nissan-considering-partnership-with-honda-evs-sources-2024-03-15/Maki Shiraki商业汽车与交通
